description.en: History of wine culture. Classification of wines and other alcoholic beverages. Classification of drinking glasses. Classification of wine glasses. Grape varieties. Factors affecting the character of wine. Sparkling wines, fortified wines, dessert wines, their preparation. Practical tasting. Winelands of the Old World, winelands of the New World. Red and white wines, their preparation. Serving wines, practical tasting. Wine and food pairing. Etiquette for drinking and serving wine.
description.et: Veinikultuuri ajalugu. Alkohoolsete jookide, sh veinide liigitus. Joogiklaaside liigitus. Veiniklaaside liigitus. Viinamarjasordid. Veini iseloomu mõjutavad tegurid. Vahuveinid, kangustatud veinid, dessertveinid, nende valmistamine. Praktiline degusteerimine. Vana Maailma veinimaad, Uue Maailma veinimaad. Punased ja valged veinid, nende valmistamine. Veinide serveerimine, praktiline degusteerimine. Veini ja toidu sobivus. Veinijoomise ja serveerimise etikett.

objectives.en: The aim of the subject is for the learner to know and be able to develop drinking and wine culture, to have an overview of wine classification, production and wine regions, and to be able to choose and serve wines according to events and types of menu.
objectives.et: Ainega taotletakse seda, et õppija tunneks ja oskaks arendada joogi- ja veinikultuuri, omaks ülevaadet veinide liigitusest, valmistamisest ja veinipiirkondadest ning oskaks valida ja serveerida veine vastavalt üritustele ja menüü liikidele.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) has an overview of the history and culture of wine and various alcoholic beverages;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) omab ülevaadet veiniajaloost ja -kultuurist ning erinevatest alkohoolsetest jookidest;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) knows the process of making wine from different grape varieties;
3) knows how to match wine and food;
4) knows the etiquette of serving and drinking wines;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) tunneb veinide serveerimise ja joomise etiketti;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) knows wine vocabulary and knows how to use it.
learning_outcomes.et: 5) teab veinisõnavara ja oskab seda kasutada.
